description.value: A gauth's stomach contains a mixture of magical enzymes and chemicals that have the ability to nullify magic. The stomach is highly valued by magic users and certain alchemists. Use: Using an action, you can rupture the stomach and spill the contents onto a magical item. The item will lose all it's magical properties for 24 hours, as well as 1d4 charges (if it is a charged item). The stomach contents do not affect artefacts or legendary items.
